name: Super Shape Shooter (introtogamesproduction)
description:
Super Shape Shooter is a low poly  simple endless shooter game were you see how long you can survive against an endless waves of enemies. Create barriers to block bullets and hazard and shot enemies to destroy
Controls
WASD - Movement

Space - Create Barrier

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Install Instructions
1. Download the Zip File2

2.  Unzip the content

3. Launch the SuperSpaceShooter.exe
